original: Broström, Dan-Axel, skeppsredare, Göteborg, f. 17/5/15 i Sthlm av skepps-red. Dan B. o. Ann-Ida Mark. G. 40 m. Ulla Holm. Barn: Agneta Cata-rina f. 41, Dan 43. — Stud:ex. 34, Gbgs hand:inst. 35. Res. o. stud. i Engl., Tysikl, Frankr. o. Finl. 35-38. Amsit. i B ro’Str öm-koncernen sed. 38. Verks t. dir. o. styr :led. i A-B Sv. Ostasiatiska Komp. sed. 42, styr :led. i A-B Tirfing, Eriksbergs Mek. Verkst, A-B, A-B Sv. Amerika Linien m. fl.
translated: Broström, Dan-Axel, shipowner, Gothenburg, born on May 17, 1915 in Stockholm to shipowner Dan B. and Ann-Ida Mark. Married to Ulla Holm in 1940. Children: Agneta Catarina born in 1941, Dan born in 1943. Graduated from high school in 1934, attended Gothenburg School of Business in 1935. Spent time studying in England, Germany, France, and Finland from 1935 to 1938. Employed in the Broström Group since 1938, serving as Managing Director and Board Member of AB Swedish East Asia Company since 1942, board member in AB Tirfing, Eriksbergs Mek. Verkst, AB and AB Swedish America Line, among others.
